name: Intellistream
overview: Intellistream Limited develops technology for interactive mobile video applications. Its products include Unistream, a 3G video content delivery platform that delivers content across various mobile devices and capabilities; Video IVR, a technology that combines traditional voice IVR with video capabilities offered by 3G handsets; Voice IVR, a platform that handles voice IVR requirements of booking and order tracking, financial services, participation television, and gaming applications; and Content Management, which allows users to edit, update, and preview live applications running on Unistream platform. The company also offers solutions for entertainment, gaming, participation television, security, marketing, and bespoke application sectors. In addition, it provides hosting and integration services. Intellistream Limited was founded in 2006 and is based in London, United Kingdom.
